item.title: Jon add a quote by Jon D. Gold
item.description: "As your metaphysician, I advise you to take two scotches and call me in the morning." -- Jon D. Gold

item.title: Jon add a quote by Jon D. Gold
item.description: "I think that every once in a while, God ventures out for a cosmic burrito of ghost peppers and moon cats. The next day he craps out a giant flaming ball of gas. Those are the stars. The planets are remnants of other meals, grilled lava sandwiches or basalt burgers with Saturn rings. The universe is Godâ€™s infinite toilet, and we are the bacteria clinging to his fecal matter." -- Jon D. Gold
